idea:
At FUTURE MAKEUP (INDIA) PRIVATE LIMITED  we strive to formulate better ideas and bring about a revolution that makes make-up not just a tool of beautification but also an element that infuses a new energy and confidence in every soul that comes in contact with our products. We always aim to come up with such revolutionizing products that can help you in becoming everything you want to be, reflecting your true potential and at the same time keep your skin healthy naturally.


With a focus to make all make-up products from the professional world easily available and accessible to common women around the world, we put our best efforts in manufacturing the best ever cosmetics to cater all make-up requirements and fulfil all purposes. We want to constantly evolve and include the latest fashion cycles and trends, effectively manage distribution networks for better investments, synergize with industry’s key players for increased business and develop rewarding customer relationships and give our customers the best cosmetic choices.
name: FUTURE MAKEUP (INDIA) PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Get Well Logistics India Pvt Ltd offers unerring, personalized services to our valued customers for international & domestic courier and cargo services around the country. We offer swift, reliable, secure, time bound and cost effective courier & cargo service to all our customers.
Get Well Logistics India Pvt Ltd was started on 2015 by a group of professional & enthusiastic people who came together to provide world class courier and cargo services.
Get Well Logistics India Pvt Ltd is managed by competent and skilled professionals who have vast experience in this field. Get Well Logistics India Pvt Ltd is on the threshold of establishing itself not only as one of the leading in service industry in reliability but also as the most competitive in air and logistics services. Get Well Logistics India Pvt Ltd offer special tariff package for its corporate customers. Team Get Well Logistics India Pvt Ltd establishes an excellent working relationship with organization and provide personal time bound service. Get Well Logistics India Pvt Ltd will endeavor to work round the clock to enhance its efficiency and proficiency and aspire to develop high competency and achieve zero error in service through team work, dedication and be synonymous with quality service. Get Well Logistics India Pvt Ltd Logistics is one of the leading courier distribution companies in India covering both domestic and international services. Get Well Logistics India Pvt Ltd takes the credit of pioneering the franchisee concept for the courier industry between India and all over the world, and today has the largest courier network serving retail and SME customers in India and all over the world. Get Well Logistics India Pvt Ltd Courier Services was formed on 2015, We stand for providing the most accurate and right Express Logistics service to our customers. With our registered office in Mumbai, We are a network of around 1000 people across India. Our strong network connects you to National & International country. As an Express Logistics service provider, we hold expertise in movement of cargo in India within the transit time. Our well established network as well as services of professionals provides us a strong and secure base for all the logistical needs of our clients. We provide logistics solutions to industries and segments like Hi-Tech, Automotive, Engineering, Pharmaceutical, Electronics and Electrical and Life style and Retail to Domestic and International City’s. Get Well Logistics India Pvt Ltd Courier Services has a holistic customer orientation across all customer facing functions, Excellent People Orientation with strong people processes and Excellent Operating Processes backed by a very robust IT solution.
name: GETWELL LOGISTICS INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED
